instruction: Given some lyrics of a song, suggest a new chorus line.
input:
Verse 1
I'm not a hero
But I still can make it through the night
output:
Chorus
We can find the strength to fight,
We can make it through the night,
We'll never know our true power 'til we try,
We'll keep on rollin' 'til the dreamers all survive.

instruction: Create a program that will detect similarities between two short texts.
input:
Text 1: The phone rang loudly as I answered it.
Text 2: I picked up the ringing phone.
output: The program will detect similarities between the two texts. It will compare the words and phrases used in each text and create a score based on the number of times a word or phrase is repeated in both texts. It will also look for other features such as length, structure and syntax. The program will then assign a similarity score to the two texts.

instruction: Explain in your own words the concept of genetic engineering.
output: Genetic engineering is a term used to describe the various process by which genes and their associated traits (e.g. diseases, physical characteristics) are manipulated in organisms. Through these methods, scientists are able to change the genetic makeup of organisms and alter their characteristics, including their growth rates, hardiness, color, and other traits. This is done by cloning, in which scientists insert carefully chosen and edited pieces of DNA from one organism into another, allowing scientists to develop new forms of organisms that contain desired traits. This process has been increasingly used in research, medicine, and food production.

instruction: Clean a dataset by removing all corrupt data from the spreadsheet.
output: The dataset can be cleaned by identifying and removing corrupt data. This can be done by scanning the data for any blank entries or any entries which contain non-standard or non-expected characters. Once the corrupt data has been identified, it can be highlighted, right-clicked and deleted.

instruction: Analyze a dataset and display it in a visual chart.
output: The dataset can be analyzed and displayed in a visual chart by using data visualization software. This software will allow you to select the relevant data from the dataset and create a chart that displays the data in an easy-to-understand format. The chart can be customized and adjusted to highlight specific data points.

instruction: Create a sentence in the third person point of view.
output: She walked down the street, enjoying the cool autumn evening.

instruction: Describe in 50 words or less the cuisine of your city.
output: My city's cuisine is rich and varied. We have a wealth of traditional dishes with strong roots in local culture and history, ranging from hearty stews and simple pasta dishes to richly spiced meats and vegetarian options. Our regional specialties are made up of a mix of Mediterranean, Latin American, and Middle Eastern flavors, making for a truly varied culinary experience.

instruction: Given two pieces of text, suggest a combination of the two that creates a cohesive story.
input:
Text 1: I had just arrived in the city, and I was mesmerized by its bustling streets.
Text 2: I finally decided to take a seat in a secluded cafe and ordered my favorite drink.
output: I had just arrived in the city, and I was mesmerized by its bustling streets. Everywhere I looked, I could see people carrying on with their lives, rushing to and fro on errands or just chatting away in the cafes. The atmosphere was vibrant, and I felt alive. Finally, I decided to take a seat in a secluded cafe and ordered my favorite drink. I thought to myself, it was time to explore this wonderful city.

instruction: Suggest a title for a novel based on the summary below.
input:

A young girl embarks on a journey to unravel the secrets of her past, only to uncover a shocking truth that will change her life forever.
output: The Unveiled Secrets of the Past

instruction: Compare the speed of light and sound.
output: The speed of light is much faster than the speed of sound. Light travels at around 300,000 kilometers per second while sound travels at around 340 meters per second.

instruction: Train the GPT to create a story with the title "A Day at the Zoo".
output: It was a beautiful day at the zoo, the sun was shining bright and the animals were all out. Ryan, an eight year old boy, had been eagerly awaiting this day as it was his first time visiting the zoo. He had heard stories of how the animals were so close you could touch them, but he had never believed it until this day. Ryan sprinted to the nearest tiger enclosure, the magnificent beast was pacing back and forth in its cage. He watched in amazement as the tiger let out a deep roar which echoed through the zoo grounds. Ryan moved on to the giraffe enclosure, there he could get even closer to these majestic creatures. He watched in awe as they gracefully moved around the enclosure. Ryan continued his day exploring the rest of the zoo, marveling at the diversity of the creatures around him.

instruction: Suggest a security policy for a small online ad-network.
output: The security policy for a small online ad-network should include the following items: Regular assessment and monitoring of the system environment; implementation of authentication, authorization and access control measures; implementation of security systems and protocols to protect data and networks; timely patching and updating of software and applications; implementation of secure software coding standards; and enforcement of strict user security and privacy policies. Regular employee awareness and training is also recommended.

instruction: Create a 5-sentence story that features flying aliens.
output:
Once upon a time, there was a planet in the corner of the universe known for its flying aliens. They travelled all around their home planet, surveying its lush landscape, and then ventured out to explore the moons and stars of neighbouring galaxies. 

Every day, the aliens flew through different places to observe and appreciate the natural wonders all around them. They had prodigiously large wings that allowed them to effortlessly travel faster than the speed of light. Whenever they grew tired, they landed in a nearby meadow and fed on the dew-filled flowers of the night.

The creatures had an incredible connection with the universe that left many amazed. They also had an innate bond with nature and every living species. Everyone revered these creatures, not only for their unfathomable beauty, but also for their grand sense of kindness and respect for all living creatures. 

These benevolent flying aliens peacefully roamed their world, and whenever they passed by, they left an enchanting spark in the hearts of those they touched. 

The End.

instruction: Design a self-improvement schedule for someone who wants to be more organized.
output:
Following a self-improvement schedule to become more organized can be a challenge, but with dedication and focus it is possible to achieve your goals. Here are the steps you should take to build a more organized lifestyle:

1. Break down large tasks into smaller, manageable goals.
2. Create a schedule for yourself and plan for each task efficiently.
3. Set reminders to stay on track and stay organized.
4. Tackle tasks one at a time and focus on the task until completion.
5. Take regular breaks throughout the day.
6. Keep a to-do list of tasks to prioritize.
7. Review your day and reflect on what went well and what could be improved.
8. Reward yourself with something special when tasks are completed.

instruction: Design a smart assistant conversation conversation flow to help users figure out local public transport fare information.
output:
User: Hi, I'm looking for information on public transport fares in my local area.

Assistant: Hi, what kind of public transport fare information are you looking for? You could tell me the type of fare you need help with, or the type of public transport you will be taking.

User: I'm looking for bus fare information.

Assistant: Sure, I can help you with that! What city are you in? 

User: I'm in Seattle. 

Assistant: Got it! Let me check the bus fare information for Seattle. Are you looking for a one-way fare, or a round-trip fare? 

User: One-way.

Assistant: Okay, the one-way adult fare for Seattle buses is $2.75. Are you looking for more information about fares, or something else? 

User: That's all I need, thank you!

Assistant: You're welcome, glad I could help! Is there anything else I can do for you?

instruction: Generate five descriptive adjectives to describe a red rose flower
output: Five descriptive adjectives to describe a red rose flower would be: vibrant, alluring, romantic, soft, and fragrant.

instruction: Suggest a relaxing bedtime routine.
output:
A relaxing bedtime routine can be beneficial for your physical and mental health. Here are some ideas to make your bedtime routine more pleasant and relaxing: 
1. Take a warm shower or bath to help you unwind. 
2. Enjoy a cup of herbal tea or a light snack.
3. Listen to calming music or an audiobook.
4. Spend a few minutes journaling or reflecting on the day.
5. Stretch your body with gentle yoga poses or try progressive muscle relaxation.
6. Meditate for a few minutes to clear your mind. 
7. Turn off screens and electronic devices one hour before bed.
8. Set a comfortable temperature and make sure the room is dark.
9. Unwind with some light reading before turning out the lights.

instruction: Name two Supreme Court justices appointed by President Obama.
output: 1. Sonia Sotomayor 2. Elena Kagan

instruction: How can I prevent spam emails?
output: To prevent spam emails, you should use a good spam filter, avoid giving out your email address to untrusted sources, set up a secondary or disposable email address, use multiple email addresses, and be mindful of suspicious email messages.

instruction: Tell me about the tallest mountain in Africa.
output:
The tallest mountain in Africa is Mount Kilimanjaro, located in Tanzania. It stands at a height 5,895 meters (19,341 feet) above sea level and is the highest peak in Africa.

instruction: Identify the atmosphere of a murder mystery.
output: Murder mysteries typically involve a dark and suspenseful atmosphere for the reader to explore. The atmosphere is typically filled with tension, fear, mystery, and suspicion. There are often clues to piece together and unexpected betrayals and twists that keep the reader on their toes. Characters are often cunning and calculating, and foreshadowing and ominous occurrences often tease out the murderer's identity.

instruction: Predict what a customer might order in a cafe.
input: It is 7:30AM on a Saturday morning.
output: The customer is likely to order a hot beverage such as coffee, a breakfast item such as bacon and eggs, toast, or oatmeal, and a breakfast pastry like a muffin or croissant. They may also order something cold, like a smoothie or juice. If it is an establishment that serves alcohol, they may also order a mimosa or bloody mary.

instruction: Create a sample document from the given template.
output: Application for Part-Time Job.

instruction: Describe the health benefits of drinking water.
output: Drinking water is essential for good health. It helps to keep your body hydrated, regulate body temperature, and lubricate your joints. Water also helps to flush out toxins and waste products from your body and keep your organs functioning properly. Adequate water intake can also help to boost your energy levels, improve digestion, and prevent headaches and fatigue.

instruction: Construct a timeline of Galileo's life.
output:
1564 - Born in Pisa, Italy
1589 - Appointed Chair of Mathematics at University of Pisa
1591 - Travels to Rome to present his discoveries
1609 - Invents telescope, begins observing the night sky
1610 - Publishes Starry Messenger 
1633 - Tried by Roman Inquisition, forced to recant his discoveries
1642 - Dies in exile in Arcetri
